issue.title: [GLib] Add support for building Apache Arrow Datasets GLib with non-installed Apache Arrow Datasets
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9060](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9060). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It's required for packaging: https://travis-ci.org/github/ursa-labs/crossbow/builds/695595159

```

  CXX      libarrow_dataset_glib_la-scanner.lo
scanner.cpp:24:33: fatal error: arrow/util/iterator.h: No such file or directory
 #include <arrow/util/iterator.h>
                                 ^
```
